desktopclient.description: Get the balloon experience to your Desktop, choose your OS:
desktopclient.hint: There is full featured desktop client app which brings your cloud to your desktop. The desktop client is available for Windows, Mac OS X and Linux. You can get if you hit the icon {icon-app-download} on the bottom left.
desktopclient.documentation: Also see the desktop client installation documentation if you want further information or instructions how to install the desktop client on Linux via package sources.
